Inpatients are treated with parenteral ceftriaxone, doxycycline, plus metronidazole OR cefotetan and doxycycline OR cefoxitin and doxycycline. If no improvement is seen in 48 to 72 hours, choose ultrasonography for evaluation of possible tubo-ovarian abscess.
